title: FlightDepartureInformation
description: The departure information for the flight

scheduled.description: Scheduled time of departure including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used.

estimated.description: Estimated time of departure including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used. Every airport should provide the best information he has, corresponding to the FIDS.

actual.description: Actual time of departure including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used. Every airport should provide the best information he has, corresponding to the FIDS.

closingTime.description: The time the gate closes for the flight.

bookingClass.description: A name (intl) of the booking class - if there are different boarding times for different classes

checkinInfo.description: The check-in information for the passenger

checkinLocation.description: The area of check-in facilities for the flight

checkInBeginTime.description: The time when check-in procedure starts for the flight

checkInEndTime.description: The time when check-in procedure ends for the flight

additionalInfo.description: Additional information about the check-in process

boardingTime.description: A list of boarding times of the flight.

bookingClass.description: A name (intl) of the booking class - if there are different boarding times for different classes

time.description: Boarding time of departure including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used. Every airport should provide the best information he has, corresponding to the FIDS.
